article_title: Public perception of health system plummets
article_text:
(AP Photo/Nicholas K. Geranios)

There are some Americans who believe the U.S. health care system is excellent.

But they are in the minority. By a wide margin.

og.description: Just 1 percent of Americans say the U.S. health care system is "excellent," according to the Employee Benefit Research Institute.
